workshoptitle: HeatWave Hands-On-Lab: One Database Service for OLTP, OLAP, AutoML, LakeHouse, and GenAI

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies. The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Compartment, VCN and MySQL HeatWave DB System and DB Data
Lab 2: Create Compute with MySQL Shell
Lab 3: Edit The HeatWave Cluster
Lab 4: Load data into HeatWave Cluster
Lab 5: Develop MySQL HeatWave App with LAMP
Lab 6: (Bonus) Create Oracle Analytics Cloud Instance
Lab 7: (Bonus) Upload data to Object Storage for HeatWave Lakehouse - orders
Lab 8: (Bonus) Load CSV data from OCI Object Store - orders
Lab 9: (Bonus) Load Parquet format data directly from Object Store - orders
Lab 10: (Bonus) Create Oracle Analytics Cloud Dataset - orders
Lab 11: (Bonus) Build a real-time dashboard in Oracle Analytics Cloud with MySQL HeatWave - orders
Lab 12: (Bonus) Upload data to Object Storage for HeatWave Lakehouse - black-friday
Lab 13: (Bonus) Load CSV data from OCI Object Store to Lakehouse - black-friday
Lab 14: (Bonus) Create and Use HeatWave AutoML Model - black_friday
Lab 15: (Bonus) Build a real-time dashboard in Oracle Analytics Cloud with MySQL HeatWave  - black_friday
Lab 16: (Bonus) Add LAMP Application
Lab 17: (Bonus)  Develop MySQL HeatWave Apps with Oracle APEX
Lab 18: Stop OCI Services
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
